exceptions.tactic: intros m x y j i m1 y0 dx H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10.

exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap x, y : dart j, i : nat m1 := L m one x y : fmap y0 := cA m zero y : dart dx := MF.degree m x : nat H : y0 = Iter (cF m) j x H0 : i < j < dx - 1 H1 : expf m x y0 H2 : inv_hmap m1 Unable to unify "MF.degree_aux (L ?M2265 one ?M2266 ?M2267) ?M2266 (MF.degree ?M2265 ?M2266 + MF.degree ?M2265 (cA ?M2265 zero ?M2267) - ?M2268) = MF.degree ?M2265 ?M2266 + MF.degree ?M2265 (cA ?M2265 zero ?M2267)" with "MF.degree_aux (L m one x y) x (j - i) = j + 1".

original: intros m x y j i m1 y0 dx H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10. unfold m1, y0, dx. intros H11 H12. apply degree_L1_merge_aux; auto.
